pageContext.claim: Covid, Covid, Covid is the unified chant of the Fake News Lamestream Media. They will talk about nothing else until November 4th., when the Election will be (hopefully!) over. Then the talk will be how low the death rate is, plenty of hospital rooms, & many tests of young people.
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely suggests the media is covering the pandemic to deny him re-election. The novel coronavirus, which causes the disease known as Covid-19, is an ongoing global pandemic. The virusâ€™s progression is in no way tied to the U.S. presidential election. With deaths soaring after the election, covid-19 remained page one news.
